name: RelatedRequirement
title: Related Requirement
description: Allows relationships to be established between data requirements. For example, a Medication data requirement that depends on a MedicationRequest data requirement.

element.definition: Allows relationships to be established between data requirements. For example, a Medication data requirement that depends on a MedicationRequest data requirement.
The id of a related data requirement (i.e. a data requirement that establishes context for this data requirement)
element.comment: As an example, consider a query for MedicationRequest with all related Medication resources (an include query). In this case the Medication data requirement will specify a relatedDataRequirement of MedicationRequest, with a path of medication.

element.definition: The path to an element in the related data requirement that establishes the relationship. The element is typically of type Reference (or in some cases canonical).
element.comment: This element is exclusive with the targetSearchParam element; either the relationship is established by the path to an element, or by a search parameter defining the reference relationship to be followed.

element.short: What search parameter establishes the relationship
element.definition: The name of a search parameter that establishes the relationship to the related data element.
element.comment: This element is exclusive with the targetPath element; either the relationship is established by the path to an element, or by a search parameter defining the reference relationship to be followed.
